title: Worried About You
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Mia-chan, don’t your bangs bother you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>No, I’m fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>But I’m worried they make it hard for you to see. Here, you can borrow this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What’s this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s a hairpin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huh!? Isn’t this way too big!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s just a hairpin with a bear playing the piano. Though I guess it is a bit big because of the bear plushie on it......  I think it suits you, though. Chika-chan thinks so too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>.....It doesn’t fit my image.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Oh... Sorry......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>No, I appreciate your concern, so don’t be sad... I’ll give it a try......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Okay! Just try it on for a minute, Mia-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
